flavors.label: Lemon Pepper
flavors.description: Zesty lemon and black pepper seasonings. This seasoning is a signature for wings.

flavors.label: Classic Hot
flavors.description: Potent spice and medium heat. Exciting experience of enjoying hot wings

flavors.label: Honey Garlic
flavors.description: Honey glazed with mild garlic tastes. Bites of sweetness and richness.

flavors.label: Honey BBQ
flavors.description: A little bit of sweet with tang. A comfortable flavor is all that you need.

flavors.label: Mango Habanero
flavors.description: Flavorful blend of sweet and spicy. Seriously, you will feel the burn.

flavors.label: Garlic Parmeson
flavors.description: Mixes of savory garlic and buttery parmeson. Delicious seasoning for your bites.

flavors.label: Mild
flavors.description: Classic hot but less spice. Just a bit of spice is fine.

flavors.label: Plain
flavors.description: No flavor added. We respect your preference.
